tgn Ethernet0/0
tgn ordered-traffic off
tgn max-bit-rate off
tgn Add UDP
tgn name ""
tgn on
tgn rate 10
tgn variability 0
tgn send 0
tgn repeat 1 no-update
tgn delayed-start random
tgn burst off
tgn burst duration on 1000 to 1000
tgn burst duration off 1000 to 1000
!
tgn datalink user-defined
tgn fragmentation disable
tgn length auto
!
tgn L2-encapsulation arpa
tgn L2-dest-addr AABB.CC00.6000
tgn L2-src-addr AABB.CC00.5000
tgn L2-protocol 0x0800
!
tgn L3-version 4
tgn L3-header-length auto
tgn L3-tos 0x00
tgn L3-length auto
tgn L3-id 0x0000
tgn L3-fragmentation 0x0000
tgn L3-ttl 60
tgn L3-protocol 17
tgn L3-checksum auto
tgn L3-src-addr increment 10.5.5.1 to 10.5.5.254
tgn L3-dest-addr increment 172.31.6.1 to 172.31.6.254
tgn L3-option-length 0
!
tgn L4-src-port increment 50001 to 50254
tgn L4-dest-port increment 50001 to 50254
tgn L4-length auto
tgn L4-checksum auto
!
tgn data-length 1000
